title: Ajax to sack manager John Heitinga less than six months after Liverpool exit - BBC Sport
snippet: Ajax have announced they will sack manager John Heitinga less than six months after he joined the club from Liverpool.

title: Eredivisie | Ajax suspends John Heitinga with immediate effect
snippet: Ajax is looking for a new head coach; in the meantime, Fred Grim will take over Heitinga’s duties.

title: John Heitinga appointed head coach of Ajax
snippet: Ajax has reached an agreement with Liverpool and John Heitinga regarding the coach’s move to Amsterdam. Marcel Keizer will be his assistant.

title: John Heitinga - Wikipedia
snippet: On 6 November 2025, just 5 months after being announced as head coach of Ajax, Heitinga was dismissed following the club's 3–0 home defeat to Turkish side Galatasaray in the Champions League, which saw them sit bottom of the league phase table, ...

title: Ajax suspends John Heitinga with immediate effect
snippet: Ajax is looking for a new head coach; in the meantime, Fred Grim will take over Heitinga’s duties.
